section: The Purpose of the Venture will be determined by the Managers.
explanation: This section gives the Managers complete discretion over the Purpose of the Venture. In Section 10 it is stated that Conduct and actions of the Managers will be dictated by policy and procedure established by the Members. Giving the Managers complete control goes against the policy and procedure estabilished by the members. It is unclear how the Venture will operate with complete discretion.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There is a misalignment in the terminology used to define the Capital Contributions of each Member. The text states 'To be determined USD' for the BorrowMoney.com, inc section. Without a specified amount, it is unclear what the agreement means, how the contributions are calculated, and creates uncertainty about the actual value of the contributions of BorrowMoney.com, inc.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: The terminology in this section is misaligned. The wording in this section leads to uncertainty and potential unfairness. If the value of the venture and a withdrawing member's interest is 'determined at the discretion of the remaining members', without any defined standards or procedures, then the remaining members could undervalue the venture or withdrawing member's interest.
